tool.name: OGS: convertToLinearMesh
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'convertToLinearMesh'.
tool.command: if [ "$input_mesh_file" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$input_mesh_file.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$input_mesh_file' '${$input_mesh_file.element_identifier}'; fi; convertToLinearMesh --input-mesh-file '$input_mesh_file.element_identifier' --output-mesh-file output_1.vtu
tool.help: This tool runs the **convertToLinearMesh** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
